file_content.text: Be careful when you leave the estate. House Organa is on the move again.
Welcome back. I'll let the baron know you're here.
My dear, you shouldn't concern yourself with trifling details.
I am concerned. This house needs all I can give--not just my gardening skills.
Enough. We'll speak later.
Your highness--it's a pleasure to see you on such a chilly day.
Ah--the Imperial emissary. I hope you're enjoying your visit to Alderaan.
Ah--the mercenary captain. I hope you're enjoying your visit to Alderaan.
But if you're here about Denri Ayl, I must disappoint. I've been gathering information--yet I cannot locate him with any certainty.
This data from House Alde might help.
I found something.
An exchange, Baron: I'll share my information if you'll share yours.
Let's make a trade.
I'm more than willing. May I?
Guess I've made more progress than you, "Baron."
I succeeded where you failed.
You speak boldly for a guest in my estate. Show me what you have.
These records--they are the pieces of a puzzle my own sources left incomplete.
It appears that some weeks ago, Master Ayl arranged a secret meeting with House Rist. That meeting is doubtless occurring as we speak.
I'm not familiar with that house.
Rist?
Ayl's not meeting with anyone--he's hiding.
He's looking for shelter.
I defer to your judgment. Still, be cautious.
I'll have to crash their party.
I'll pay them a visit.
I'd caution you to leave this matter alone.
House Rist is a stain upon the nobility--a house of slayers and poisoners.
I suggest you wait for Denri Ayl's return--a month, perhaps two. Don't earn the Rist assassins' ire by interfering in their affairs.
Unfortunately, my mission is urgent.
I can't afford to wait.
I admire your energy, but these games should be played with caution. Confronting Rist will do no good.
It'll take more than dilettantes with knives to hurt me.
They don't worry me.
House Rist earned its place through cunning and murder. Its blades are not dull, and confronting them will do no good.
Maybe you're right.
Good. I appreciate an ally who knows caution; confronting Rist will do no good.
Now--I must cut this discussion short; I have other matters to attend to.
See to our guest, my lady. Make certain Cortess hospitality remains second to none.
I'm sorry about my husband. He's a busy man... and a brave one. Just not brave enough to confront House Rist.
Oh?
A war against House Rist would get both of you killed.
He can't afford mistakes.
He believes that. Maybe he's right. Maybe that's why I'm so frustrated.
You're confusing bravery with stupidity.
Only a fool would be.
Then you plan to wait Ayl out? You don't seem like someone content to sit around in hopes of an easy solution.
Everything the baron said about Rist is true. They are a stain on society--and a foe of Cortess.
When I was a child, Rist assassins poisoned my father and slit my brother's throat. Justice was never done.
If Rist is so abhorrent, why let them continue?
Then strike back.
If Rist really is my enemy, your family will be avenged.
I'm going after them.
We live in fear of their blades. But you found our lost patrol, stole Denri Ayl's records...
Why are you telling me this?
What are you saying?
You have no idea the things I can do.
I'm very capable.
I can imagine.
The baron won't listen to my ideas. But you could show him the meaning of bravery.
Don't mistake me for your champion.
I'm not your hero.
Like I did the baron, once? Just listen.
You could show all the houses that defying Rist isn't hopeless. Find Denri Ayl. Fight the assassins--and go with all our hopes.
I don't like assassins. I'll make sure they remember my visit.
I'll fight House Rist.
You gladden my heart.
Maybe.
That's enough from you.
You could show all the houses that defying Rist isn't hopeless. Find Denri Ayl. Fight the assassins. Change things for all of us.
I will.
Thank you. Sincerely, thank you.
[Flirt] As you wish.
You're very kind.
You know--it's a long journey. Join me in my chambers? We could get something to warm you before you go.
I think the baron might get the wrong idea.
You're married.
And we wouldn't want that.
Cortess hospitality really is second to none.
Absolutely.
And there's a lot more to see.
And when we're through... you can leave for Rist, and take my hopes with you.
Not a chance.
Ah--I was out of line, I think. Forgive me.
I'll leave you alone. I'd warn you to be careful, but... I know you will be.
I'm not here to serve you or your house.
I won't be your lackey.
If that's how you feel, then I won't take any more of your time.
Goodbye, your highness. I'll see you if you return.
Farewell. I'll make sure the baron hears of your eloquence.
You're welcome to look around the estate.
The baron is expecting you. This way, please.
Our guest has arrived, my lord.
Baron Peyar Cortess, Sword of the Castle Lands--I hereby present to you the honorable Countess Thul, emissary of her house.
Baron Peyar Cortess, Sword of the Castle Lands--I hereby present to you the honorable Count Thul, emissary of his house.
Baron Peyar Cortess, Sword of the Castle Lands--I hereby present to you the honorable emissary of the Sith Empire.
Baron Peyar Cortess, Sword of the Castle Lands--I hereby present to you an honorable friend and a soldier of fortune.
This woman risked herself in the service of House Cortess, valiantly recovering our lost patrol and identifying the Killik threat.
In appreciation of her noble deeds, and out of respect for her accomplishments, I ask that you grant her recognition.
This man risked himself in the service of House Cortess, valiantly recovering our lost patrol and identifying the Killik threat.
In appreciation of his noble deeds, and out of respect for his accomplishments, I ask that you grant him recognition.
I so grant her recognition.
I am Baron Peyar Cortess, my lady. Welcome to my home.
I so grant him recognition.
I am Baron Peyar Cortess, good sir. Welcome to my home.
The pleasure is mine, Baron.
Thank you.
Then we are both fortunate.
I've been trying to reach you for some time, Baron.
At last we meet.
Yes. Baroness Chay informs me you first arrived when I was otherwise occupied.
Allow me to present Kaliyo Djannis, my loyal and trusted associate.
Let me introduce my companion.
Such an exotic young woman... how is it you come to be here?
I slid out of mama's womb and picked up a blaster. Now I'm your new friend's bodyguard.
Course, you and me could be friends, too. You've got a nice place here--I could stick around awhile.
Baron...
You... are an intriguing creature, I admit.
Hear what he said? That was sweet!
I think you've caught his interest.
The baron likes you.
What can I say? Baron needs some excitement in his life.
I assure you my husband has enough excitement.
With those manners, you could be royalty.
You're fitting right in.
I could welcome people just like the baroness.
Forgive the Rattataki, Baron--her species lacks restraint.
I apologize for her, my lord.
I'm sure her other fine qualities compensate for it.
Knew I liked you, Baron. We should talk politics.
With due respect, Baron, I'd rather talk in private.
Can we talk somewhere else?
There's no need for privacy. My court is loyal and trustworthy.
I hope I didn't give the wrong impression at the gates. I just take the security of my house very seriously.
One of few things she does--along with her gardens and her akk dogs.
You'll make me blush, my lord.
Tell me, now--why do you seek my house? Is there a favor you would ask? An alliance you'd propose?
I'm trying to identify a visitor to House Cortess. I know when he was here, but not his name or face.
It's about a guest of yours.
I need to identify a man. I think you might be able to assist.
I'm looking for someone.
I'll gladly help. Show me what you have.
The dates in your files... yes, we've had visitors at these times. But that's no surprise.
This data describes someone who interests me. Take a look.
Check this out for me.
I don't know what I'm looking for, but... very well.
Ah, I see. A visitor to my house.
I believe the guest you're looking for is Master Denri Ayl. We've hosted him and his summits on a number of occasions.
I'm afraid I don't recognize the name.
Who?
Summits?
Tell me where to find this man.
I need to talk to him.
Ah. Well, it may not be so easy as that.
Denri Ayl was once Lord Denri Ayl--a powerful and respected man among the vassal houses. But some years ago, he abdicated his position.
He become a mediator dedicated to forging peace.
Strange you should ask about him now. For several weeks, Denri Ayl has been missing. Whether off on some secret negotiation or something more regrettable, no one knows.
Isn't anyone trying to find him?
Aren't people worried?
Not that I'm aware of. One missing man in all this chaos... but it bears investigation.
We can't let him disappear. It would be... unfortunate.
We have to find him.
I know which possibility I'd wager on.
Oh, I have a suspicion.
I'll begin looking into Ayl's whereabouts through formal and informal diplomatic channels. If I can find him for you, I will.
You may also wish to investigate the matter yourself. I'm sure House Thul has friends who can assist.
You may also wish to investigate the matter yourself. I'm sure the Empire has contacts who can assist.
You may also wish to investigate the matter yourself. I'm sure a mercenary of your caliber has sources.
I appreciate your efforts, Baron.
Thank you.
You'll let me know if you find anything?
Keep me informed.
Of course. I'll send a message immediately.
Uh-huh.
Good. Together, we can find the mediator.
In the meantime, you're welcome to stay as a guest. House Cortess prides itself on its hospitality.
We'll have to dine together. You can meet the akk dogs.
The baron has spoken! This audience is at an end.
Are you supposed to be in the estate?
